PSY 703: Data Science for Psychologists: A Refreshed Exploratory and Graphical Data Analysis in R [...] Welcome to class! This website is designed to accompany Mason Garrisonâ€™s Data Science for Psychologists (DS4P). DS4P is a graduate-level quantitative methods course at Wake Forest University. This class assumes zero knowledge of programming, computer science, linear algebra, probability, or really anything fancy. I encourage anyone who is quant-curious to work their way through these course notes. The course notes include lectures, worked examples, readings, activities, and labs. You can ...
